body_html:
Two questions:

  • How can I give a module two inputs for testing? Is providing a second optional argument (for embeddings) even a good API for relation modules? Pinging @jekbradbury because I don't even use relation networks, someone just challenged me to code up one 😉
  • The relation function is made out of pretty standard functions. Any idea why the tests are failing?
body_text:
Two questions:

How can I give a module two inputs for testing? Is providing a second optional argument (for embeddings) even a good API for relation modules? Pinging @jekbradbury because I don't even use relation networks, someone just challenged me to code up one 😉
The relation function is made out of pretty standard functions. Any idea why the tests are failing?
body:
Two questions:
- How can I give a module two inputs for testing? Is providing a second optional argument (for embeddings) even a good API for relation modules? Pinging @jekbradbury because I don't even use relation networks, someone just challenged me to code up one :wink: 
- The `relation` function is made out of pretty standard functions. Any idea why the tests are failing?
